author: johnh
msg: Refactor HTTP JS serving into a pluggable pipeline, to break up JsServlet's ad hoc/monolithic functional nature. Adds additional testing along with inherent capability for code augmentation. JsHandler, producing core code, remains untouched so it may be shared with metadata JS service.

author: schor
msg: no Jira, correct some things in the Release process

author: akarasulu
msg: minor cleanups to get rid of IDEA warnings
